title: Steal a Swordmaiden's Heart
description: King Theseus of the Court of Knowledge is desperate. Without the help of a warrior fae court, his court will be overrun on the coming, deadly Midsummer Night. His only choice is to risk his life and attempt to win the hand of Queen Hippolyta of the Court of Swordmaidens. Yet the trials are more tricky than he had expected, and Queen Hippolyta is cold, hard, and indifferent to him. Not to mention, he finds himself starting to fall in love with the servant woman Ariadne instead. Will he win the hand of the Swordmaiden Queen? And will he have to sacrifice his heart to do it?
author: Tara Grayce
